title: UCDmanager
creator: jordisan
description: UCDmanager is a FREE collaborative web application aimed to manage and document different User-Centered Design and usability techniques, in an integrated manner: user roles, personas, heuristic evaluations, usability user testing, etc.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr title="Web Content Accessibility Guidelines">WCAG</abbr> 1.0 — <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0
